displayName: Elasticsearch - Prometheus - High JVM Memory Usage

documentation.content: When the ratio of heap used to max heap becomes high, then application's performance may start to degrade.

conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query:
fetch prometheus_target
| { t_0:
      metric
        'prometheus.googleapis.com/elasticsearch_jvm_memory_used_bytes/gauge'
  ; t_1:
      metric
        'prometheus.googleapis.com/elasticsearch_jvm_memory_max_bytes/gauge' }
| outer_join 0
| value t_0.value / t_1.value
| condition val() > .9
| every 5m
| window 5m
